front.title: Analysis of Multihoming in Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: Mobile IPv6 as specified in RFC 3775 allows a mobile node to maintainits IPv6 communications while moving between subnets. This documentinvestigates configurations where a mobile node running Mobile IPv6is multihomed. The use of multiple addresses is foreseen to provideubiquitous, permanent and fault-tolerant access to the Internet,particularly on mobile nodes which are more prone to failure orsudden lack of connectivity. However, Mobile IPv6 currently lackssupport for such multihomed nodes. The purpose of this document isto detail all the issues arising through the operation of Mobile IPv6on multihomed mobile nodes.
